catalog_info.title: Sophomore Tutorial in Archaeology
catalog_info.notes: Required of all concentrators in Archaeology.
catalog_info.description: This course will focus on archaeological thinking, the cognitive skeleton of the discipline of archaeology, the principles and the logic that are the foundation of all archaeological conclusions and research. Central to this is an understanding of research design, archaeological theory and interpretation, culture and material culture; as well as an understanding of how to examine and construct an archaeological argument.
